item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Doctor Who Confidential BBC iPlayer
item.description:
I was wondering if anyone who has BBC iPlayer could rip the Doctor Who Confidentials Series 1 to 6 from the site. I don't have a VPN and to my understand most VPN's don't even work so If anyone who is in the UK and has BBC iPlayer could rip the Doctor Who Confidentials I would be eternally grateful.

https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episodes/b006q2xb/doctor-who-confidential
item.author: CandyLegend
